text: Hi, I want to create a list/ contacts based on API calls from my website, unable to find HubSpot API keys. Can anyone pls help?

Hi, I am developing app for help desk conversation. But i am not able to find API which will provide list of actors with there role. How can i the list of actors and there role ? any API ? Anything ? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/api/conversations/>    . I have found this API <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/api/conversations/inbox-and-messages#post-%2Fconversations%2Fv3%2Fconversations%2Factors%2Fbatch%2Fread|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/api/conversations/inbox-and-messages#post-%2Fconversations%2Fv3%2Fco[…]sations%2Factors%2Fbatch%2Fread>. which input should i pass in payload?  Please help with solution.

Hello everyone, could someone help me with the following API -> <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/associations/deal/line_item/batch/create|https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/associations/deal/line_item/batch/create> POST method passing the Authorization: Bearer access_token in the header. The body looks like this:
`{`
  `"inputs": [`
    `{`
      `"from": { "id": "31197360201" },` 
      `"to": { "id": "27035298121" },` 
      `"type": "deal_to_line_item"`
    `}`
  `]`
`}`

(Yes, the Deal ID and the Line Item ID are correct).
It ends up returning empty. I check the Deal and there is nothing added:

`{` 
  `"status": "COMPLETE",`
  `"results": [],`
  `"startedAt": "2024-12-30T16:07:17.937Z",`
  `"completedAt": "2024-12-30T16:07:17.937Z"`
`}`

Hi everyone,
I have a few questions regarding the API capabilities available in our HubSpot account, specifically with Sales Hub Professional and CMS Hub Professional:
1. *API Access & Capabilities:*
2. 
    ◦ With our HubSpot version (Sales Hub Professional and CMS Hub Professional), do we have the ability to create custom API calls and trigger actions via the API?
    ◦ If yes, could you please confirm the specific API capabilities we have based on our subscription?
3. *Deleting Emails via API:*
4. 
    ◦ Is it possible to create an API call that allows us to delete emails in the HubSpot inbox based on specific criteria? For example, if we search for the string "809548," can we use an API call to delete all emails containing that string in the HubSpot inbox?
Thank you for your assistance!
